item.title: Monday, December 15th
item.description: A reminder that course selection sheets for next year are due to your homeroom teacher by Friday. If you have any questions about your choices, please stop by Guidance during lunch. Attention all students: There will be a student council meeting today at lunch in Room 214. New members are always welcome—come share your ideas and get involved! Athletics update: The senior boys’ basketball team has a home game tonight at 3:30 p.m. Come out and support the team. Go Ravens! Community involvement reminder: Students still working on their 40 volunteer hours are encouraged to check the school website for approved opportunities or speak with a Guidance Counsellor for help getting started. Friendly reminder: Please make sure you are placing garbage and recycling in the correct bins throughout the school. Let’s all do our part to keep our school clean and welcoming. Friday, December 19th News item 1 News item 2 News item 3 Thursday, December 18th News item 1 News item 2 News item 3 Wednesday, December 17th News item 1 News item 2 News item 3 Tuesday, December 16th News item 1 News item 2 News item 3
